programs.description: Engage in cutting-edge research projects with industry experts and academic mentors.

programs.description: Transform your ideas into viable products with expert guidance and resources.

applicationSteps.title: Choose Program
applicationSteps.description: Browse our programs and select the one that aligns with your goals.

applicationSteps.title: Submit Application
applicationSteps.description: Complete the online application form with your details and requirements.

applicationSteps.title: Interview
applicationSteps.description: If shortlisted, attend an interview with our program coordinators.

applicationSteps.title: Get Started
applicationSteps.description: Upon acceptance, receive onboarding information and begin your journey.
